#summary XQuery function to generate a nice html table heading

= HTML Table Headings  =

HTML headings are generally written like this:

{{{
<tr>
  <th>ID</th>
  <th>MAC Address</th>
</tr>
}}}

which produces something like this:

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>ID</th>
    <th>MAC</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th></th>
    <th>Address</th>
  </tr>
</table>

But sometimes you want a multi-line heading so the table columns are not too wide. To do this you might write something like this:

{{{
<tr>
  <th>ID</th>
  <th>MAC</th>
</tr>
<tr>
  <th></th>
  <th>Address</th>
</tr>
}}}

which produces something like this:

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>ID</th>
    <th>MAC</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th></th>
    <th>Address</th>
  </tr>
</table>

or you might prefer this:

{{{
<tr>
  <th rowspan="2">ID</th>
  <th>MAC</th>
</tr>
<tr>
  <th>Address</th>
</tr>
}}}

which produces something like this:

<table>
  <tr>
    <th rowspan="2">ID</th>
    <th>MAC</th>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Address</th>
  </tr>
</table>
